descriptor.name: Boost Chocolate Nutrition
descriptor.long_desc:
Boost is one of Indiaâ€™s leading malt-based foods, fortified with a combination of micro-nutrients that are essential for oxygen utilization and energy metabolism. Boost is clinically proven to increase stamina by 3 times (3X) more. Enjoyed by cricket superstars across India, the delicious chocolate Boost drink can be prepared with hot or cold milk and is fortified with 17 essential vitamins and minerals.

Boost is a nourishing beverage that helps build stamina and contains nutrients that aid in the maintenance of optimal bone and muscle strength. Boost is enriched with Envita nutrients (Iron, Vitamin A, C, Folic Acid, B12, and B6), which help transport oxygen more effectively in the body.

The nutrients present in Boost nourish the body in multiple ways:

Iron and Vitamin C help in the effective transportation of oxygen to muscles.
Vitamin B12, Vitamin B2, Vitamin B6, and Folic Acid: In the presence of oxygen, muscles produce more energy.
Boost helps in the optimal utilization of oxygen.
Vitamin D, Calcium, and Protein help in the maintenance of optimal bone and muscle strength for overall strength.
Vitamin B1, Niacin, Biotin, Pantothenic Acid, Iodine, and Magnesium are energy-releasing nutrients that help release energy from food.

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_prepackaged_foo.nutritional_info: BOOST Original Rich Chocolate Balanced Nutritional Drink is designed to provide nutritional energy with 240 nutrient-rich calories and B-vitamins to help convert food to energy. Plus, it has 10g high-quality protein and 27 vitamins & minerals including vitamins C & D, zinc, iron and selenium.
@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_prepackaged_foo.additives_info: Vitamin B1, Niacin, Biotin, Pantothenic Acid, Iodine, and Magnesium are energy-releasing nutrients that help release energy from food.
